name: must be quick (1/10)
description:
I tried to make this in under 1 hour but I hit a snag on building the curved tiles. Under 2 hours is still OK!

My first game for this year's Variety Megajam

Inspired by

  • The 1st inspiration-theme: https://itch.io/jam/vmj2020/topic/1088699/inspiration-for-your-1st-game
  • Adam Saltsman's 1985 tileset: https://adamatomic.itch.io/1985

Yes I stole the Sonic ring sound effect from youtube what're you gonna do about it
